name: Hungry Jungle - LDJAM48
description:
Fall deeper into the Hungry Jungle where many monsters try to eat you up!

This is a procedurally generated dungeon-like jungle game, and the scope was really big.

There’s a ranged + melee combat system with 6 different monsters and 6 weapons. 4 character types, each with their quirks and 14 berry-bushes!

Controls: The game only uses mouse controls. Right click + drag and left click.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/hungry-jungle
